name: Spring3-rest
tagline: Spring3 Rest example, demonstrating multiple representations support, custom exception handler and more
body:
spring3-rest
============

##### Spring3 Rest example demonstrating

1.  multiple representations support
2.  Custom Exception Handling
3.  Authentication
4.  Authorization with jsr 250
5.  Custom Aspect
6.  Testing
7.  Codahale Metrics
